name: Vineyard Captured Video File
summary: Learn about .MYS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MYS files can only be played back using the PC Viewer software that was included with the CCTV system.

description: Captured video stream saved by Vineyard Technologies' PC Viewer, a program used to record and playback video using a Vineyard CCTV (Closed-circuit television) system; stored in a Vineyard proprietary video stream format; used to save surveillance videos.
